project_name.justification: The primary project of interest is confirmed in the title: "Ridgeline Minerals Executes Exploration Earn-In Agreement with South32 at the Selena Project, Nevada".

company_name.justification: The text states that Ridgeline Minerals Corp. has entered into an earn-in agreement with "a wholly-owned subsidiary of South32 Limited (South32)", identifying South32 as the acquiring party.

ceo_buyer.justification: The text provides the name of the President & CEO of Ridgeline Minerals (the seller), Chad Peters, but does not mention the name of the CEO for the buyer, South32 Limited.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: South32 can acquire an initial 60% interest and then has an option to increase its ownership to a total of 80%. The rule is to use the final potential ownership: "South32 will have a further option to increase its ownership interest in the Project to a total of 80% by incurring an additional US$10.0 million in expenditures..."

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as having a "shallow-oxide Ag-Au ± Pb-Zn Chinchilla discovery" and potential for "high-grade CRD type mineralization (Ag-Au-Pb-Zn ± Cu-W)", with Silver (Ag) being a key component.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled "Ridgeline Minerals Executes Exploration Earn-In Agreement with South32 at the Selena Project, Nevada", which directly pertains to the project of interest.

currency.justification: The document explicitly states at the beginning: "All dollars are US dollars".

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of a US$100,000 execution payment and a future US$500,000 payment. The text states: "South32 will pay Ridgeline a US$100,000 execution payment" and "making a one-time cash payment of US$500,000 to Ridgeline on or before the fifth anniversary of the Agreement."

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms outlined in the document consist of cash payments and exploration expenditures, with no mention of payments being made in the form of shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Explicit cash payments are detailed, so this field is null per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The agreement does not involve the issuance of shares as part of the consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No information regarding share warrant payments was found in the provided text.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text describes earn-in options related to project interest, but not financial option payments as part of the consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares are being issued as part of the transaction, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is defined as a monetary value, not a drilling distance in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total potential exploration commitment is US$20 million, comprising an initial US$10 million and an additional US$10 million for the second option: "...for an aggregate spend of US$20.0 million, as outlined below."

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) being acquired or retained as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The project is described as "a 39 square kilometer land package".

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified in the text: "a 39 square kilometer land package".

resource_size.justification: The text mentions a "discovery" and "potential for high-grade CRD type mineralization" but does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate with mass or volume units (e.g., tonnes, ounces).

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the buyer as South32 Limited but does not provide a stock ticker or exchange for it. The ticker provided in the authoritative metadata (TSXV: RDG) belongs to the seller, Ridgeline Minerals Corp.
